index.description: User-defined values, callbacks when the event is triggered, to distinguish which image it is
index.description_zh: 用户自定义值，在事件触发时回调，用以区分是哪个图片

error-img.description: A placeholder map when an image loads incorrectly
error-img.description_zh: 图片加载出错时的占位图

threshold.description: The position at which the load is triggered, see the instructions above, in rpx
threshold.description_zh: 触发加载时的位置，见上方说明，单位 rpx

duration.description: When the image is loaded successfully, the fade time is in ms
duration.description_zh: 图片加载成功时，淡入淡出时间，单位ms

effect.description: When the image is loaded successfully, the CSS animation effect will fade in and out
effect.description_zh: 图片加载成功时，淡入淡出的css动画效果

is-effect.description: When the image is loaded successfully, whether to enable the fade effect
is-effect.description_zh: 图片加载成功时，是否启用淡入淡出效果

height.description: Image height, note: The actual height may be affected by the img-mode parameter
height.description_zh: 图片高度，注意：实际高度可能受img-mode参数影响

img-mode.description: 图片的裁剪模式，详见image组件裁剪模式  (opens new window)
img-mode.description_zh: 图片的裁剪模式，详见image组件裁剪模式  (opens new window)

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when an image is clicked

events.name: load
events.description: Triggered when the image loads successfully

events.name: error
events.description: Triggered when an image fails to load
